syllabus_leaves.path: ROTATION OF THE EARTH > Effects of the Rotation of the Earth > The side of the earth towards the sun constantly gains heat and the side away from the sun constantly loses heat by radiating it into outer space > The short rotational period makes the variation of temperature between day and night moderate.
path_titles: Effects of the Rotation of the Earth
The side of the earth towards the sun constantly gains heat and the side away from the sun constantly loses heat by radiating it into outer space
The short rotational period makes the variation of temperature between day and night moderate.
syllabus_leaves.title: The short rotational period makes the variation of temperature between day and night moderate.

syllabus_leaves.path: ROTATION OF THE EARTH > Effects of the Rotation of the Earth > The side of the earth towards the sun constantly gains heat and the side away from the sun constantly loses heat by radiating it into outer space > Rotation in combination with Revolution (earth's movement round the sun) causes seasons and variations in the lengths of day and night over different places on earth.
path_titles: Effects of the Rotation of the Earth
The side of the earth towards the sun constantly gains heat and the side away from the sun constantly loses heat by radiating it into outer space
Rotation in combination with Revolution (earth's movement round the sun) causes seasons and variations in the lengths of day and night over different places on earth.
syllabus_leaves.title: Rotation in combination with Revolution (earth's movement round the sun) causes seasons and variations in the lengths of day and night over different places on earth.
